ch.unibe.iam.graph.drawing
Class GraphElementRep

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.drawing.GraphElementRep
Direct Known Subclasses:
EdgeRep, NodeRep
public abstract class GraphElementRep
extends java.lang.Object

Stores data specific to the layout representation of a graph element. Each GraphElement can be assigned a label (=comment) and a color.

Version:
$Revision: 1.15 $ $Date: 2004/06/02 15:13:44 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger
